thread.title: Sanjay Gupta: Aishwarya is a team player
thread.title_full: Sanjay Gupta: Aishwarya is a team player - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Sanjay Gupta: Aishwarya is a team player
text:
Director Sanjay Gupta is impressed with Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's hard work and dedication towards her acting and finds her efforts and hard work "commendable".

Sanjay Gupta with Aishwariya Rai Bachchan 
"She is a team player. She is a military on the set. She completely surrenders herself and the amount of homework she does and comes prepared on the sets is commendable," the director said.
Aishwarya, who is making a comeback on the silver screen with Sanjay's 'Jazbaa', is playing a lawyer and a mother, who is threatened to fight the case of a rape and murder-accused criminal.
The film, which also stars Irrfan Khan, Shabana Azmi and Jackie Shroff among others, is slated to release on Friday.
